name: Flight Of The Viking: Flying Back Into History
name_original: Flight Of The Viking: Flying Back Into History
description:
The Wright Brothers, Howard Hughes, Emelia Aerhart….All great Pioneers in the history of Aviation. But long long before that in a land far away, there was a Viking who dreamed he could fly.

This is his tale, this is his game. You will need to Tap, Tap, Tap to fly up, and release to fall downward. Stay away from the Rock Walls! Help the Viking get as far as he possibly can in his Sputtering Plane. While avoiding the stone structures.
